PyLadies Meetup at DjangoCon

September 05, 2011 | Tag: » Events

All women at DjangoCon are invited to the PyLadies meetup, Wed night at DjangoCon US! Â Thanks to Michelle Rowley and Eric Holscher (both of PDX Python) for organizing and planning the party.

Gents who participate in IRC channel #pyladies and guests of women are invited too.

Wednesday, September 7, 2011 8pm onward Location: Ringlers Annex of McMenamins

(Note: this is the Annex a block east of Ringlers, not Ringlers itself) 1223 S.W. Stark Portland, OR 97205 (503) 384-2700

http://www.mcmenamins.com/250-ringlers-annex-home

By Audrey Roy
